author: lalyos
body:
This Dockerfile makes very easy to get started with PowerShell on linux.

You can try my public image:

```
docker run -it lalyos/powershell
```

Once its merged, it can be build under the Microsoft DockerHub user, so it will be

```
docker run -it microsoft/powershell
```
